title: 3 BED/1 BATH SINGLE HOME+NEW FURNACE NEW AC, HOT WATER TANK,
posting_body: ****With easy flow from room to room, entertaining is also made easy!

3 BED/1 BATH SINGLE HOME+NEW FURNACE NEW AC, HOT WATER TANK,Welcome home to this cozy moving in ready , sun-kissed 3-BR, one-bath lovely ranch with shimmering hardwood floors accentuated by the natural light flooding in from every angle.
New Furnace New AC, Hot water tank, and Chimney.
The spacious living room is perfect for everyone to enjoy family time together and relax with a movie.
With easy flow from room to room, entertaining is also made easy!
The dining room is right off the kitchen, making serving dinner a breeze.
Large kitchen with gorgeous granite countertops, Stainless Steel Appliances, fantastic backsplash paired with an under-mounted sink, doing cleaning up easy, and a wealth of cabinet space.
